Introducing our latest indulgence in hair care and fashion – our Satin
Scrunchies!

Elevate your hair game with these luxurious, larger-than-life scrunchies that
effortlessly blend style and comfort.

Crafted from premium satin fabric, these oversized scrunchies not only make a
bold fashion statement but also provide a gentle touch to your hair. The
smooth, silky texture of satin helps reduce friction, preventing breakage and
minimizing those annoying kinks that regular hair ties can cause.

With an extra-large size, these scrunchies are perfect for creating
voluminous, eye-catching hairstyles. Whether you're rocking a messy bun, a
high ponytail, or a chic top knot, our new Satin Scrunchies add a touch of
glamour to any look. With 3 colours to choose from, you can find the perfect
scrunchie to complement your style and outfit.

Treat your tresses to the luxury they deserve – our Satin Scrunchies are
designed for all-day comfort and hold. Say goodbye to hair damage and hello to
a stylish, hair-friendly accessory.

##  Shipping, Returns + Payments

Thank you for choosing to shop online at  **Boutique Love Attack**.

### **Shipping**

  * **BRITISH COLUMBIA (LOCAL) SHIPPING  **is a flat rate of $11 CAD with free standard shipping on orders of $100+ CAD. There are also Canada Post Xpresspost + Priority shipping rates available at checkout should you need your order quickly.
  * **CANADA WIDE SHIPPING**  (excl. Nunavut, Yukon and Northwest Territories) is a flat rate of $15 CAD with free standard shipping on orders of $100+ CAD. There are also Canada Post Xpresspost + Priority shipping rates available at checkout should you need your order quickly.
  * **YUKON, NUNAVUT + NORTHWEST TERRITORIES:  **﻿﻿Shipping rates are auto-calculated for orders under $100 CAD. Free standard shipping on orders $100+ CAD
  * **US  SHIPPING** standard shipping is $15 CAD for a tracked packet. Customers can also choose from Canada Post Expedited Parcel USA, Small Packet USA Air, Tracked Packet USA or Xpresspost USA rates. FREE EXPEDITED PARCEL US SHIPPING on orders $100+ CAD. Please select a tracked shipping option for tracking number. Shipments will be sent using Canada Post, UPS, DHL or FedEx depending on destination and rates available.
  * **INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING**  rates are auto calculated at checkout by integrated shipping and are based on weight of package and destination. Shipments will be sent via Canada Post, UPS, DHL or FedEx depending on destination and rates available.

International, Xpresspost and Priority shipping rates are calculated
automatically based on the size, weight and destination of shipment. All
orders ship within 24 hours from our office Monday- Friday and within 48 hours
on weekends and statutory holidays.

Once order is has shipped, you will receive a tracking number (provided you
choose a tracked delivery option) by email so you can track your purchase and
track when you can expect delivery.

Our shipping times are estimates and it may take less or more time. Packages
are dropped off by hand to the Canada Post office (our shipping provider) and
from that point on, the shipment is out of our hands and control. Canada Post
will keep scanning the tracking number and provide real time updates on the
location and progress of the shipment.

### **US + International Orders**

Love Attack is not responsible for customs fees, duties, taxes or delays for
international orders. Any and all fees are the responsibility of the customer.
Boutique Love Attack cannot issue refunds if the customer refuses to cover all
the customs fees of their order and the box is returned.

It is possible that a delay in your delivery could occur due to customs. If
you do not have tracking on your item, there is no way for us or you to see
where the package is located or what customs office it is being held at. If
you require tracking of your item, please ensure you choose a  **TRACKED**
international shipping option at checkout.

Due to the Covid 19 pandemic, there may be unexpected delays in International
and US deliveries. Unfortunately, this is beyond our control.

### **Returns**

Boutique Love Attack does not accept exchanges or refunds of items due to the
category of items which we sell.

If an item arrives damaged, please send an email to  **zoe** **@loveattack.ca
**with photographic proof of the damage and I will happily assist you.

### Exchanges

For  **clothing items only,  **we will accept size exchanges as long as the
garment has not be worn and the hang label is still attached and not tampered
with. The clothing can not also be soiled with tanner, makeup or stains.

Boutique Love Attack is not responsible for shipping charges and/or customs
fees and import/export taxes for size exchanges. Please take this into
consideration when exchanging items. Once the original item has been returned
and received, we will then ship you out the replacement.

If an item arrives damaged, please send an email to  **zoe** **@loveattack.ca
**with photographic proof of the damage and we will happily assist you.

Exchanges can be shipped back to: Boutique Love Attack, 44465 Freshwater Dr,
Chilliwack, BC V2R 6A3.

### Payments

###

###

All prices on the site are listed and charged in  **Canadian Dollars (CAD)**.
We now have a currency selector on the home page if you wish to display prices
in your local currency. Currently Boutique Love Attack accepts VISA,
Mastercard, American Express and Apple pay as a form of payment.

### Let me help!

Should you have any queries or requests regarding shipping, returns or
payments,  please email    **zoe** **@loveattack.ca**  or send a request
through the  **contact page**.
